column3: “Smell, taste and texture are awesome. The shatter is easy to consume, very relaxing. Arb is great for pain management.”

“This is a new favorite for me!! I have had a very high energy unable to sit down day and as a night cap I smoked a little of this Arctic Blue!! It was an instant body relaxation coupled with that much needed disconnect from the high stress of my day. I was sure I was going to be able to shut it down today but this strain saved me!!”

“This is a true Alaska original strain. It is the legacy of the fabled Alaska Thunder Fuck strain.

Truly it is a master piece and work of love and art!

It leaves you with a deep relaxing mellow high and yet still keeps you motivated it is hands down the best strain on the market!”
“Love this one. It helps my fibromyalgia pain and my anxiety, a rare combination!”
“Wonderful, relaxing. Relives pain and stress. A must try.”

“I have a bad time sleeping and night and this strain helped me get an amazing night of sleep I don't think I even moved!! 
The blueberry taste was very mild I couldn't really smell any blueberry but I do t buy weed for the smell.  I def would recommend this strain and look forward to getting to try it again and again!!”
“Great and strong immediate high. Strong cerebral effects but gets me very tired after an hour or two”
“I think that this strain is fuckin incredible. Five stars for a reason holy smokes I'm into it, definitely a go from me.”
“It's our go to, get through the day smoke, because it's soo good it never gets old!”

“omg, this hits hard but feels amazing. I could hardly sit still after, great high that can leave some a little paranoid if you are a light smoker. I highly recommend for those who want a good high with the energy to still move throughout the day!”
“Tried this for the 1st time last night, amazing blueberry flavor. Very nice! What a treat to finally try on my birthday. Thanks Dave!”

“Heavy indica with sativa notes. Unique almost blueberry flavor, with Alaskan roots. One of the best grown strains ever sampled, both bud and BHO. I also sampled rosin fresh pressed from ArcticBlue buds during a Dabatizer event, Super terpy, delicious all around.”
“Good strain for a chilling/fun type of feel.”
“Beautiful indica!!! Smells like pie and doesn't couch lock terribly, yum yum yum! What a pleasure!”
